body.name: InstaNatural Vitamin C Face Toner, Brightens, Balances pH and Reduces Signs of Aging, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, with Witch Hazel, Lavender and Geranium Oils, 4 Fl Oz

features: Brightens, Refreshes and Refines: Our Vitamin C Facial Toner primes the skin for serums and toners while balancing pH, minimizing pores and reducing the signs of aging such as fine lines and wrinkles
Clean Skincare that Works: This energizing astringent combines Vitamin C, Witch Hazel, MSM, Aloe Vera and botanical extracts to brighten, hydrate and nourish the skin for a radiant complexion
Your Skincare Routine, Powered by Vitamin C: Pair our toner with our Vitamin C Cleanser, Serum and Moisturizer for an effective skincare regimen
Core Clean Promise: We are committed to creating skincare products formulated without potentially harmful ingredients, showing the world how effective natural beauty products can be

Great for All Skin Types: Our Vitamin C Toner, in our convenient pump bottle, is gentle enough even for sensitive skin. For a limited time, you may receive either spray bottle or pump bottle packaging

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is my favorite for my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, terrible dispenser.
reviews.reviewText: I love this toner! Everything about the product itself is wonderful. But, the dispenser is terrible. I can barely get any of the product out. I’m going to get a different, smaller spray bottle and transfer the toner to it so that I have more control over the product. I’ve had multiple beauty items with the pump dispenser like this one, and normally they’re fine, but this one barely dispenses any product and what it does dispense is concentrated in one tiny area making it difficult to apply the product. I’ll keep buying this, but I hope they fix the issue with the bottle it comes in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars InstaNatural Vitamin C Face Toner
reviews.reviewText: InstaNatural Vitamin C Face Toner, Brightens, Balances pH and Reduces Signs of Aging, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, with Witch Hazel, Lavender and Geranium Oils, 4 Fl OzBought this for my wife. Great product would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coming from someone who has worked in Dermatology for 8-9 years...
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always had a love-hate relationship with toners ranging from questions that I get constantly at work like, “is this really worth it?” “Isn’t my face going to burn from Vitamin C?” And the unsolvable mystery regarding witch hazel and it’s efficacy since It always seems to burn skin on contact. I have worked in Dermatology for around 9 years and I love this product. I apply twice daily, I also use Replenix Green Tea Fortified Cleanser and CeraVe PM lotion, retin-a cream, with a glycolic peel 2-3x per week depending on the amount of breakouts I get on my chin. It sounds like a ton but it’s actually very quick (>2min). Being in Dermatology for so long, I have a pretty good idea of what works for acne, oily, anti-aging skin. As the information state on the packaging, Vitamin C brightens, tones, and refines fine lines. It also helps exfoliate old acne scars (hyperpigmented areas from previous acne bumps) over time.I do feel a little tingling sensation when I apply this toner, but it is not painful. I also spray onto a cotton pad an apply on problematic areas of my face as needed. I have oily Mediterranean skin, there is nothing that will get rid of excess oil/sebum from my skin for over 2 hours... this leaves my skin matte and vibrant for around 4 hours until my inherited skin traits kick back in.This also has Vitamin E and Glycolic Acid in it. Vitamin E is good for cell rejuvenation, maintaining healthy skin and can be used to prevent aging/ increase healing (in some cases) Glycolic Acid is a great exfoliator and helps get rid of those hyperpigmented areas after a pimple has gone away.All that said— I think this is a worthwhIle purchase. You have many options when it comes to skin care and usually the dollar amounts matter the most. This is a very inexpensive helpful option for acne prone, oily, anti-aging skin and will last months. The entire line of InstaNatural seems very effective and wallet friendly. I would highly recommend this product as well as the InstaCare line to my patients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I miss the OLD FORMULA!
reviews.reviewText: When they switched to the new bottle, the formula changed. I really enjoyed the old mist bottle, but I figured I'd give the new packaging a try as long as the formula was the same. When I received it, I compared both and realized they weren't the same. Meh... tried it anyway. I even put the new stuff in the old bottle. Whelp, I've gone through 2 of the bottles with the new formula and my pores aren't looking as great as they were with the old formula. I forgot how well the original helped my skin. I'm now in the market for something that has the old ingredients. This new stuff isn't horrible, just not as great. I say, try it out for yourself. You'll for sure know after one bottle if it's worth it. As for me, I'm 41 and need something a little stronger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2014
reviews.reviewText: I am extremely happy with ALL of the InstaNatural products that I have purchased and used so far!! I am currently using Vitamin C Facial Toner, Moroccan Rose Water, Age-Defying Skin Cleaning Serum, Age-Defying Moisturizer, Emu Oil, Hyaluronic Acid Serum, Argon Oil Hair Mask, Argon Oil, Vitamin C Serum, and Eye Gel. I have tried countless skin care products from different companies in the past, but I have never been happier since I found InstaNatural products.My daily facial care routine is:1) Cleanse - wash my face with organic soap and exfoliate2) Tone - spray Moroccan Rose Water (morning) / Vitamin C Facial Toner (night) I also spray these throughout the day to refresh my face. Both smell great!3) Serum - apply Hyaluronic Acid Serum (morning) / Age-Defying Skin Cleaning Serum (night)4) Under Eyes - apply Eye Gel5) Moisturizer – apply Age-Defying MoisturizerMy hair care routine is after washing my hair in the shower, I apply Argon Oil Hair Mask throughout my hair as a deep conditioner/treatment and wash it out at the end of my shower. I apply Argon Oil and Emu Oil to my dry hair (especially to the ends) whenever my hair gets frizzy.These products are made of high-quality, predominantly natural and organic ingredients combined with beneficial vitamins and acids. Also of much importance to me, these products do not rely upon preservatives, artificial colors and fragrance to create the illusion of efficacy. I have found that all InstaNatural products have a pleasant, mild and natural scent and that products absolve into skin and hair without feeling greasy. The products work great for moisturizing skin and hair without causing any breakouts on my face and body or making my hair flat. Also, the company provides excellent customer service. In addition to providing detailed instructions regarding the use of the products, the people I have communicated with are happy to answer any questions. This company truly cares about customers and is trying their best to make safe and effective products at a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Have been using this for almost 10 yrs
reviews.reviewText: I am a man, and I really like this product. I have been using this facial toner for almost 10 yrs, and I will keep using it.

Este producto me funcionó muy bien cuando empece a usarlo. Mi piel es mixta y me estaba ayudando con los poros abiertos pero después de semanas de uso sentía que algo irritaba mi piel. Uso más de 5 pasos en mi rutina y no sabía que me estaba resecando la piel hasta que deje de usar este tónico. Mi piel estaba muy seca y el maquillaje acentuaba la resequedad que tenía. En cuanto empece a usar un tónico hidratante mi piel mejoró. No recomiendo este producto.

Compré este producto SIN descuento, así que esta opinión no está condicionada. El formato y la aplicación es súper cómodo, yo uso dos pulverizaciones para la cara. Mi piel es mixta y sensible y no sabía cómo me iría. Cuando lo pones y se va secando se nota un poco de tirantez (al menos yo) pero se va en seguida. Se nota que hidrata y refresca la piel, queda mucho mejor preparada para la crema o el sérum. La cantidad del producto está muy bien en relación con el precio. He seguido comprando más productos de la linea y de la marca y los recomiendo sin lugar a dudas.
Molto buono è un tonico diverso da molti in commercio è una lozione speciale molto molto delicata..una carezza sul viso!!!consiglio vivamente!

Ce produit est vraiment génial. L'odeur est tres agréable et je l'utilise comme lotion démaquillante, comme tonique, et pour hydrater ma peau en complément de mes soins habituels. Il est à base de vitamine C et de plus il ressère les pores. Je l'ai adopté.
